transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Arre kaun chutiya bol raha hai, behanchod phone kaat raha hu phir bhi samajh nahi aa raha madarchod tere ko?
Baat kaise kar rahe ho?
Arre kya karu phir itni baar phone laga raha hai, kaam kar raha hu, kuch kaat raha hu, samajh nahi aa raha tere ko, chutiye, pagal hai kya?
